details.title: Machine Learning Engineer
details.desc: Vadum is seeking a Senior Signal Processing Engineer/Scientist to develop machine learning and complex signal processing algorithms. The individual should be capable of leading efforts or playing a key role in a variety of machine learning and algorithm development for next-generation applications; including radar, detection, classification, compression, fusion and encryption.
